storyInfo: Silence leaves Rhodes Island for a while at the same time that Ifrit leads her first operation. As the captain, she must take responsibility and lead her team, which includes Eyjafjalla.

attributes.content: Silence!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hey, Ifrit. Welcome back.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You're back early today. No new missions from the Doctor, I presume?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Medical says I need some follow-up exams soon, and I'm not allowed to go running around outside. The Doctor told me to rest up, too.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Silence, why are you packing...? Are you going on a trip?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Yes... It's urgent, and I might be gone a while.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Where are you going? Are you going alone?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Bring me with you!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I'm going alone, but don't worry. I'll have excellent help there.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I can't bring you with me this time, Ifrit.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Why?!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Silence, are you... Are you going back there?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I know Saria has been looking into those in lab coat! I know you have been, too! And MuMu. She came here looking for Saria, and I know that's got to do with them, too!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: You guys may not tell me anything, but I can tell!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Tell me, Silence! I'm not a kid anymore!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Ifrit...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Right, you're not a kid anymore.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Okay, come here.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You've lost weight, Silence.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: No, silly... You've grown up.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: The Liberi's hands, soft and agile yet covered in thin calluses from years of handling lab equipment, slide down from her hair and caress her now pointy chin.
For as far back as Ifrit can remember, Silence has very rarely been so intimate.
Silence would usually only lightly touch her skin as though she was frighteningly fragile.
There were a couple times when she got so sick that she couldn't tell any faces apart, but she could clearly feel a pair of hands like these touching her.
The hands seemed to be trembling, but they immediately offered Ifrit the support she needed and made her feel at ease.
Now, these hands first lightly brush her face, before firmly holding her shoulders. She tries her best to stand up straight, hoping to make herself seem a little more dependable.
The Liberi breathes a sigh and says:

attributes.text: 'We shouldn't be keeping things from you anymore.'
'Saria and I are going on a trip back to Columbia.'
'What we're doing there has not only to do with everything you went through all those years ago, but also much more.'

attributes.content: ...frit? Ifrit?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Did you fall asleep? You can wake up now. We're done with the tests.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Mmm...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: What's wrong? Not feeling so good?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Dr. Silence isn't here, so we're just doing some basic checkups. So far, nothing's really jumping out at me...
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: But if you don't feel well anywhere, be sure to tell us!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Ifrit isn't going to tell the medic that ever since the day she lied down on the operating table, the pain in her limbs has stayed with her every waking moment, never abating for even a second.
Before, when she felt the pain, she would cry, make a fuss, fail to fall asleep at night.
But now, Ifrit has gotten used to it. She knows it will stay with her forever.
This is no big deal. She can bear it.
What are you making a fuss over?! There's nothing to worry about! I'm just dizzy from lying down for so long.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hey, if we're done here, can I go?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hold on a minute. Let me get you a copy of the report.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Hey, what's wrong? Where's the report?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Uh, hold on. What's that face? S-Stop crying...!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I'm not crying!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Haha, you crybaby!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Ifrit!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: It's... It's true that only Dr. Silence has access to the detailed reports, and I've only been assisting her, but I can tell!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Over the last few years, the number of Originium crystals on the surface of your skin has clearly grown...
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: If this keeps up, your condition will deteriorate even faster! You always say everything's fine, but how is this fine?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Ifrit, I have to recommend you restâ€”
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Enough! Shut up!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Just shut up... I don't wanna talk about it.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I'm not gonna lock myself up in a room, spending my days getting blood drawn and taking medicine. Not a chance! How is that living?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: But...!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: But nothing!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: No buts... Silence doesn't tell me much, but I'm not stupid. I know my own body better than anyone.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Ifrit...
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: And because I know my condition, I can't just sit here and do nothing!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I need to become even more badass than Saria! That way, no matter what happens, I'll actually be able to help...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I can't waste time anymore.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Alright... I get it.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I'm not going to talk you out of it. I trust you to make your own decisions.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: However!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Huh?! What now?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: You can bet I'll be on your back about important things like this. You can't be so reckless anymore, like when you burned that bounty hunter camp last time, pressing on with the mission as injured as you were...
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: If we have to carry you back here again... Hm-hmm! You're in a hospital bed for a whole month!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I didn't have a choice...! It's not like I wanted to do that!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Besides, I'm the captain this time! It's my first time playing the leader.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: So what? That's all the more reason to look after yourself!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Take some painkillers. You're going on a field op, so bring a couple extra bottles!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: And remember to come in for a checkup as soon as you're back!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Ugh, I got it. You're so annoying.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: *cough*... Anyway, just uh, thanks for everything.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Don't worry about me. I'll be fine!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Silence did not finish her sentence before she left.
Ifrit can only guess at her intent. What did Silence want to tell her? What exactly did she want for her?
Did she want her to help with something? Did she have a mission for her? Or did she just want her to be a good girl so she wouldn't have to worry during her trip?
Ifrit keeps wondering over and over, and a part of her thinks that, just maybe, Silence was only hoping she would be safe.
Silence's attitude toward her is completely different from Saria's.
Saria might expect her to grow up to become a woman who can stand on her own, while Silence has only ever wanted her to live a peaceful life.
Silence said she's gotten taller, grown up.
Ifrit knows that even if she feels powerful and indomitable, she actually hasn't grown up to the point that Silence would change her mind and think of her as dependable.
Not yet.
Far from it.
She still has a long path to walk, even if there isn't much time left.
Wow... I never imagined there would really be such a huge cave!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: That's tremendous, Eyjafjalla! It's almost exactly where you predicted!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Oh, there's a really pretty rock over there!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: It's breezy.
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: This would be a nice place for a nap. It's so cool to the touch when you lean here.
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: Hm... This is strange. The position and scale of this cave system are both a little off compared to the estimates.
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: It's within the normal margin of error, but it bothers me a little anyway.
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: The humidity here is rather high, and the soil... it doesn't feel firm.
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: We need to test the soil inside too... Ahh!
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: Watch out!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: T-Thank you, Ifrit.
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: You'd better find your footing before you talk... Did you scrape yourself? Are your hands okay?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Don't worry. I'm fine.
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: I'll decide whether you're fine or not. I'm the captain!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Let me see your hands!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I'm really okay...
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: Hmm, looks alright...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hey, you, sand girl! You're here as a bodyguard, too. Stop slacking!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hm...? Oh, it's fine. She's not going to get hurt even if she trips. I'm keeping an eye out.
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: Just like this... I'll catch Eyjafjalla.
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: Do you want to join me, Ifrit? It's breezy here. Feels nice.
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: I'll pass. You keep leaning.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: So our mission this time is to investigate the geological features of the caves here and the surrounding area, right? Let's hurry up andâ€”
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Whoa! Everybody, come take a look!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: What happened?!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: There's a lot of pretty ores here!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Ifrit! This one's an especially great fit for you! Look!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Stop screwing around! Get to work!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Look at me. I don't know much about geology, but I'm the captain now. You guys gotta listen to me! Your safety's my responsibility, too... So, please, can we get on with the work?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: That goes double for you, black ears! Stop running all over the place without your captain's permission!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Yes, ma'am! I'm ready to take to your orders, Captain!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Right, Ifrit, this is for you!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: What is it...?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: It's an ore I found over here. Look at this red color. Doesn't it look really nice on you?
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Hehe, it's yours!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Hm... Hmph! It's just a rock...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: You don't like it? But it looks so good on you.
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: A-Alright! I never said I wasn't taking it! Don't give me that face!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Now gimme it!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Ifrit's blushing again.
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: I'm not!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Gah, I'm not even going to waste my breath on you. Eyjafjalla, how is it looking there?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I've been gathering samples on our way here.
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: So far, I haven't found anything, but just as I thought, this place has some discrepancies with the predictions I calculated.
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: I think we need to go deeper. I want to see the situation inside.
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: Then what are we waiting for? Let's go!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: It feels like... it got colder...
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Do we have to keep going? Just how deep does this cave get?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Um, according to my calculations, we should only be about halfway in.
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: I'm back.
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: I gathered some soil samples from deeper inside. Here. Is that all you need?
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: Yes, this will do it. Thank you.
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: With these samples, I can make a detailed analysis.
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: And what will that analysis tell us?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Quite a lot. Our primary objective is to observe the strata here to see if they're stable and to make some Catastrophe-related evaluations.
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: Speaking of which, there's one thing that bothers me.
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: I saw lot of cracked ores scattered all over the ground on our way. They ought to have fallen in here through the fissure on the mountain on this side.
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: It's strange. Normally, there shouldn't be so many fissures.
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: You're right. That does sound strange.
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: I want to take a look at the fissure you mentioned.
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: (Yawns)
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Ifrit, that was your eleventh yawn.
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: Eyjafjalla and Mint should be a little while longer. You can come over here and lean against me, if you're so tired...
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: I told you, I don't wanna!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: The Doctor even told me to take care of you. Hmph, easy peasy lemon squeezy. That jackass must think I'm weak!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hmm, in that case, why are you so tense?
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: Who's tense?!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: This is called being responsible! Get it?!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: We're both bodyguards. You'd better shape up. Don't drag me down...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Did you hear something just now?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Yeah, I've been feeling uneasy for a moment...
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: It's getting close.
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: â€”Here it comes!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: The fissures are too big! They can't be natural!
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: And these data results...
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: I've got it! It's an Originium Slug swarm!
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: The ore layer here is looser than elsewhere, because this is a large Originium Slug breeding ground!
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: That also explains the lower temperature and higher humidity, and based on these results... the rock formation here might be unstable!
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: You're absolutely right about that, but â€”ahhhâ€”the slugs are here!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Hm, that's a big swarm.
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: Eyjafjalla, that's amazing.
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: Not the time or the place! Your analysis is right, but stop analyzing!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: There's too many. We gotta run!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Shit, why are the bugs still chasing us?!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I'll burn you allâ€”!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hah, how do you like that?!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: They're just a bunch of bugs. It's been a while, but let me fire up the barbecue!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Gah, there's no end to them... This sucks...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Remember, you asked for itâ€”
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Out of my way!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Ifrit burned a large group to a crisp! But there's still a lot more!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Ah! They're chasing us again! This behavior is common to this type of slug... They chase intruders!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: Hfff... *pant*...
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: Hey, little goat, pick up the pace! Are you hanging in there alright? If you can't take it anymore, say so. I'll carry you back!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Little... goat?! You mean me?
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: Who else?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I... *cough*... I'm doing okay...
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: My sand can't hold them off for too long... Hm, this is bad...
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: Dammit, I can't take it anymore!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Let's see just how many of these slugs there are. I'll burn them all!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Ah... Wait, Ifrit!
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: Stop using your Arts! The rock formation here isn't stable, and your flames are... too intense.
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: So what?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: If you don't keep your flames under control, this cave could come crumbling down!
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: You guys go on ahead. I'll stay to deal with the slugs!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: No!
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: You can't.
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: No!
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: This is my mission! You follow my orders!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Eyjafjalla

attributes.content: What, you don't really think I'm trying to be a hero like in the movies? Hmph, ever since Silence watched a few, she's been arguing with me every day about how stupid the heroes are.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I'm not stupid!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: If we can't burn the rock formation, then I just have to keep my flames under control, right?!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Makes... sense? But are you sure you can do that?
attributes.name: Mint

attributes.content: I can! I know I can.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Trust me. I already told you, your safety is my responsibility!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Mm-hmm... Okay. I trust you.
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: They're gone.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hah, finally, I can burn everything down!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.text: You can't hold it in anymore, little thing.

attributes.content: Hmph, you want me to go berserk? In your dreams!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: You know I've learned to control my flames.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Now lend me your strength, you fat freak!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.text: Is this how you ask someone for a favor?

attributes.content: Cut the crap. I'm being plenty polite just by giving you a heads up!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Can you bring me anything besides pain? I stopped being afraid of you a long time ago!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: What I want to burn and how I burn it is all up to me!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.text: Hah, little thing, you've gotten cockier.
You know they haven't gone far, don't you?

attributes.content: So what? I can protect them!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I won't... hurt my teammates... my friends...!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Ifrit...
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Noâ€”!
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Ifrit was once unable to control the flames burning in her heart.
She once swore she would control them one day, in order to keep those she loves from harm.
When Saria apologized, she opened her eyes with difficulty.
A shining blade, bright as snow, was mere inches from her, but it was the sadness teeming in Saria's eyes that she found far sharper.
Ifrit did not want to see such a sight ever again. She decided she would do what it takes to ensure Saria and Silence never look that way again.
She is no longer powerless as she was.
Now, she can do it.
Just you watch, fatso!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: These flames don't obey you anymore... They answer only to me. They belong to me!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: One of these days, I will do you in completely! Just you wait!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: How did it go? Is it over?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Why do I even need a checkup? I'm not hurt at all!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: You filled an entire cave with fire, and you even worked with the other operators, using Arts together. You almost caused a cave-in...
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: When did the four of you become so reckless?!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Grrr, how do even you know about that...?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I better not find out who spilled the beans. It's not even a big deal! Why tell?!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Oh, don't say that. From the sound of it, things got pretty intense.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: If Silence found out about this, how much more homework do you think she'd make you do?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: You bet your behind I'll tell Dr. Silence once she's back!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Ugh.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Do you even know how dangerous that was?! If... If...
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Can't you see I'm fine?! Stop harping on about that! I was extra careful this time!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: You said you were gonna give me a checkup when I got back, and I came. What more do you want?!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: So don't tell Silence, okay?! You can't!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Oh? So now you're scared.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: I'm not scared! I'm just... well... I just don't want to worry Silence.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: We don't know when she's coming back, either. I really hope Saria is with her, too.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Eh, them... They'll come back once things are taken care of over there.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Thenâ€”!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Before you ask, I don't know what they're up to. I don't know anything.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: I can't be bothered with all that. You keep yourself clean by not asking questions. I don't even have enough time to upgrade my Meeboos; no way I'm gonna worry about anything else.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: You better behave yourself. I'm sure the Doctor's already gone over it, but you're grounded for a while, huh?
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Yeah...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: We'll be in Columbia in a couple days. You'd better not do anything reckless when we get there!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Sheesh, I get it!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Silence told me what she's doing... I'm not gonna give Silence or Saria any trouble.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Yep, looks like you really have grown up.
attributes.name: Mayer

attributes.content: Heheh, just you wait. One day... I will be super dependable.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: When that time comes, Silence won't be so worried about me, and when she runs into trouble, she's bound to come to me for help!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: 'Ifrit, help us!'
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hehe, I can't wait to hear that!
attributes.name: Ifrit
